data.title: Shahid Kapoor shares details about his "edgy action thriller" film Deva
data.meta_description: Shahid Kapoor shares details about his "edgy action thriller" film Deva. Shahid Kapoor shared details about his next fil
data.text:
Shahid Kapoor is currently preparing for his upcoming romantic drama Teri Baaton Mein Uljha Jiya with Kriti Sanon. The movie is set to release on February 9, and prior to the release, Shahid held an Ask Me session, during which fans asked about his next film Deva.

A fan asked him, “Sir any details about the movie #Deva ?” To which Shahid replied, “It’s an edgy action thriller with lots of action and thrill and very character driven out on 11th October.”

It's worth noting that the first look for Deva was unveiled on October 24, 2023. Shahid Kapoor will sport a buzz cut for his role in the upcoming police film. The actor revealed the news about his new movie on Instagram during last year's Dussehra.

He also revealed the first glimpse of his character. The image showed Shahid displaying his short hairstyle while holding a gun. He was wearing a bracelet and a half-button shirt paired with khaki pants. Shahid completed his look with sunglasses reminiscent of his character in Kabir Singh. Sharing the photo, Shahid wrote, "DEVA in theatres on Dussehra 11th October 2024."

The movie also features Pooja Hegde. Deva will be directed by Rosshan Andrrews and produced by Zee Studios and Roy Kapur Films.

See Also: Shahid Kapoor reveals his next film, Deva. Release date out
